title: Muddler Common Definitions Schema
description: Shared definitions reused by Muddler JSON schemas.

yesNo.description: Mudlet stores many booleans as the strings "yes"/"no"; muddler also accepts real booleans and coerces them.

luaScript.description: Lua code. Leave empty to let muddler pull the matching .lua file from src/<type>/... during build.

fileRef.description: Relative path used internally by muddler; usually set automatically.
